articles.title: Global response to coronavirus puts effectiveness of quarantines to the test - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Global response to coronavirus puts effectiveness of quarantines to the test The Globe and Mail Fifth suspected coronavirus case in Canada is B.C. woman who had 'close contact' with Wuhan visitors National Post View full coverage on Google News
articles.content:
Journalists gather near the Diamond Princess cruise ship as it docks in Yokohama port on February 6, 2020.
KAZUHIRO NOGI/AFP/Getty Images
The first hint of a quarantine arrived at 6:30 a.m. Wednesday, when an announcement told early risers aboard the Diamon… [+5606 chars]
